channel.title: Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change October, 2022 22.4.1 Supports Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager 12.2.1.4 domain deployment using the October 2022 container image which contains the October Patch Set Update (PSU) and other fixes released with the Critical Patch Update (CPU) program. Changes to deployment of Logging and Visualization with Elasticsearch and Kibana.
